tool.name: SAGA.sim_ihacres.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayDATE_Field False isArrayDISCHARGE_Field False isArrayPCP_Field False isArrayTMP_Field False isArrayINFLOW_Field False output_data_TABLEout $output_data_TABLEout output_data_TABLEparms $output_data_TABLEparms name SAGA.sim_ihacres.0 TABLE $TABLE DATE_Field $DATE_Field DISCHARGE_Field $DISCHARGE_Field PCP_Field $PCP_Field TMP_Field $TMP_Field INFLOW_Field $INFLOW_Field bUPSTREAM $bUPSTREAM USE_TMP $USE_TMP NSIM $NSIM AREA $AREA STORAGE $STORAGE IHACVERS $IHACVERS SNOW_TOOL $SNOW_TOOL prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.outputType_TABLEout transmissionMode_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.transmissionMode_TABLEout outputType_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.outputType_TABLEparms transmissionMode_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.transmissionMode_TABLEparms

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DATE_Field
param.label: Date Column
param.help: Select the column containing the Date The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: DISCHARGE_Field
param.label: Streamflow Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Discharge Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: PCP_Field
param.label: Precipitation Column
param.help: Select the Column containing precipitation Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TMP_Field
param.label: Temperature Column
param.help: Select the Column containing Temperature Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: INFLOW_Field
param.label: Subbasin Inflow
param.help: Select the column containing inflow data to the subbasin The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: bUPSTREAM
param.label: Is the subbasin upstream (no external inflow)
param.help: If checked, it means there is no external inflow to the subbasin

param.name: USE_TMP
param.label: Using temperature data?
param.help: If checked, then temperature data are used.

param.name: AREA
param.label: Area of the Watershed in [km2]
param.help: Area of the Watershed in [km2] used for unit conversion

param.name: SNOW_TOOL
param.label: Snow Tool on/off
param.help: If checked the snow module is active

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEout
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TABLEout
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEparms
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TABLEparms
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Calibration Tool for the Model IHACRES <br/> <br/> <br/>Reference: <br/> <br/>Jakeman, A.J. / Hornberger, G.M. (1993). <br/>How Much Complexity Is Warranted in a Rainfall-Runoff Model? <br/>Water Resources Research, (29), NO. 8 (2637-2649) <br/> <br/>Croke, B. F. W., W. S. Merritt, et al. (2004).<br/>A dynamic model for predicting hydrologic response to land cover changes in gauged and ungauged catchments. <br/>Journal Of Hydrology 291(1-2): 115-131.
